about_stmt: Providing a free and open experience for mixing e-liquid.
i18n_stmt: Want to assist the project with translations?
privacy_stmt: This site does not collect or store any personally identifiable information. It stores access logs containing the IP address and user agent making all requests. These logs are kept on an encrypted-at-rest server with strict access control.
home_section_api_text: The heart of the Gusta Project is an OpenAPI service that allows anyone to utilize our data to build open source DIY software and web sites. Our flavor database is built upon data collected by the DIY community, as well as from manufacturers, and curated by volunteers to ensure accuracy.
home_section_community_text: Our community DIY web site is being built in parallel with our OpenAPI in order to provide the community with the best tools possible. We are building an open source web site that can be maintained for years to come by the community and your data will never be held behind a paywall.
home_section_tools_text: As the Gusta Project matures, we hope to provide open source libraries and tools to promote the use of our OpenAPI. We hope to proliferate new open source projects by providing the data and libraries they need to get started.
home_section_contribute_text: The Gusta Project is a group of DIY community members and anyone can join! We are as passionate about providing quality, open source tools as we are about mixing!
home_section_i18n_text: Our project site supports multiple language and we would like to provide as many translations as possible. If you are able to assist with translating this site, please do!
not_found_stmt: Unfortunately, that page does not currently exist.
